history.text: Hey :)
Hi
How are you?
I am doing good, how about you
Doing pretty well, thanks for asking.
what do you think about the movie The Social network...?
have you watched that movie before?
Hmm, I've heard of it, but I haven't watched it. What's it about? I'm assuming something with social media lol
Yes I believe it is about the Foundation of Facebook
Oh, that sounds cool. Like how he started it?
Yes how it came into picture...
Looks like it has got a very good rating
I think character played by Jesse Elsenberg  as Mark Zuckerberg was very good and well represented
Interesting. Is it just surrounding him or does it involve other people, too?
Yes it surrounds his family..
Oh, I do like him as an actor. He looks kind of geeky lol so I guess it makes sense.
basically he and his sister started the company
There were some critics about the movie but overall it was a success
Based on the information it looks like the Cinema Score was not great...
It is only B+
Do you agree with the rating of the movie
hey r u there
Well, since I haven't seen it, I wouldn't know
understand when you get a chance u should watch it
But I'm kind of weary of the way critics rate and rank movies because they usually look at all these different aspects that the typical movie goer doesn't look for
So, I usually watch a movie if it's within the genres I like or if people I know tell me about it
Yep totally true...we cannot decide to watch a movie just based on ratings
I don't know if my sister and I would be good at running a company together haha
LOL good one
We have differences in opinions and the way we like to work
What genre of movie would it be placed in?
I believe it would be placed under Drama
It has a whole lot of drama in it....more conversation oriented
Which genre of movie do you prefer..?
Ohhh, okay. I like drama sometimes, and since it's essentially a biopic, it should have drama
Life consists of some type of drama lol
Sure it does

uid2response.feedback: The other user was able to tell me the title of the movie, what it's about and the rating critics gave it. I have seen the Social Network, and I think he gave enough information about how the movie plays out, which is like a biopic. I decided to watch because of what the other user told me and how the interaction went.
